ground_truth.thought: 获取关于股票市场投资的最新策略文章3篇
ground_truth.name: PolygonFinance.get_latest_articles

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_latest_articles', 'description': 'Get the latest articles on a specific topic related to finance.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the query to search for articles'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'articles', 'description': 'a list of articles, each article is a dict with title, author, and publication date'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_index_performance', 'description': 'Get the performance data of major stock indices over a specified period.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'index', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the stock index to get performance data for'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'period', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the period for which to get performance data'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'performance_data', 'description': 'a list of performance data points, each point is a dict with date and index value'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_realtime_data', 'description': 'Get real-time data for a specific stock ticker.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'ticker', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the stock ticker to get real-time data for'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'realtime_data', 'description': 'a dict with current price, volume, and other real-time data'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_investment_advice', 'description': 'Get investment advice based on a specific investment goal.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'goal', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the investment goal for which to get advice'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'advice', 'description': 'a list of investment advice, each advice is a dict with strategy and risk level'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我需要了解如何通过股票市场为退休做准备。首先，获取关于股票市场投资的最新策略文章3篇。然后，查询过去五年内主要股票指数的表现数据。接着，获取当前股票市场的实时数据。最后，通过股票投资分析工具，给出适合退休人士的股票投资建议。当前这一步的目标是什么?
